function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher concentration of VOCs in buildings can lead to skin, throat, and respiratory irritation, as well as broader set of illnesses including headaches, fatigue, and respiratory symptoms.","Impact":"Increased risk of illnesses and discomfort for occupants.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and using air purifiers to reduce VOC levels.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems.","People":"Occupants of the building.","Owner":"Building management or owners."},{"Description":"Mixture of pollutants in indoor air can generate secondary pollutants that are more harmful than the primary ones.","Impact":"Increased health risks for occupants due to exposure to secondary pollutants.","Mitigation":"Implementing effective air filtration and purification systems to remove pollutants.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, purification technologies.","People":"Occupants of the building.","Owner":"Building management or owners."},{"Description":"Presence of biological agents in indoor air can degrade overall air quality and cause respiratory diseases and allergic sensitization.","Impact":"Increased risk of allergic sensitization, asthma, and respiratory diseases for occupants.","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning, use of air purifiers, and implementing measures to reduce biological agents.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, cleaning technologies.","People":"Occupants of the building.","Owner":"Building management or owners."}]}
